TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamespaceManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This is an anchor class utilized in managing entities, such as queues, topics, subscriptions, and rules, under your namespace. Namespace address and access credentials must be provided to manage your namespace.

example.code: NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);
NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);
NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);
NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);
NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);
NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), NsSettings);

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> addresses) cil managed

Docs.param: The full addresses of the namespace.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. You must supply your base addresses to access your namespace. Anonymous credentials are assumed.
Docs.exception: Thrown when addresses field is null.
Thrown when addresses list is null or empty.
Thrown when address is not correctly formed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> addresses, class Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs.NamespaceManagerSettings settings) cil managed

Docs.param: The full addresses of the namespace.
Contains the ServiceBusCredential as well as an OperationTimeout property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. You must supply your base addresses to access your namespace. Anonymous credentials are assumed.
Docs.remarks: Even though it is not allowed to include paths in the namespace address, you can specify a credential that authorizes you to perform actions only on some sublevels off of the base addresses, i.e. it is not a must that the credentials you specify be to the base adresses itself
Docs.exception: Thrown when address or settings is null.
Thrown when addresses list is null or empty.
Thrown when address is not correctly formed.
